snippet: Prime Minister Garry Conille said he planned to seek international support for a reconstruction program in Haiti that would be submitted to Parliament for approval.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Garry Conille said he planned to seek international support for a reconstruction program in Haiti that would be submitted to Parliament for approval.

headline.main: Haiti’s New Prime Minister Emphasizes the Need for Jobs
headline.print_headline: Haiti’s New Prime Minister Emphasizes the Need for Jobs
